EmailTemplate.description: NCP CE Credit Audit Results Notification
EmailTemplate.name: Program Profile Audit Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: NCP CE Credit Audit Results
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear NCP,
Thank you for submitting the required audit documentation. Your audit is now closed. You may view the status and any commentary in your ECCHO Online account via the CE Audit Tab (under NCP Continuing Education).
In addition to completing this audit, you cannot be audited again for the next 5 years.
Please reach out with any questions at ncp@theclearinghouse.org.
